caption:
Ever feel like your belly’s flat in the morning but by evening you look 6 months pregnant? You’re not alone—and it could be SIBO (small intestinal bacterial overgrowth).

Here’s what you can do:

	•	Get tested with our MicrobiomeIQ Gut Test
	•	Try herbal antibiotics (berberine + oregano oil)
	•	Explore Juna’s Gut Protocol: Add spore-based probiotics + detox enzymes
	•	Incorporate fermented foods

Let’s get to the root, not just the bloat.

#wellness #guthealth #detox #guthealing #debloat #reels
